p: SOB and DSOB were extracted twice by sonication at 30 °C with an ethanol aqueous solution (70%, v/ v) for 30 min. The obtained extracts were concentrated at 37 °C using a rotary evaporator (RE-2000A; YARONG, Shanghai, China) under vacuum, lyophilized (FreeZone 4.5; Labconco, Kansas City, MO, USA), and stored at −20 °C for the determination of TPC, TFC, polyphenols, and antioxidant capacities. TPC was determined using the Folin–Ciocalteu colorimetric method and expressed as gallic acid equivalents (GAE) [ 17]. TFC was evaluated using the method reported by Kainama et al. [ 18] and expressed as (+)-catechin equivalents (CE).
